is2 0.0.2.9000
  • Reference

Reference

Package

Top level package documentation

is2-package

is2: Importance Sampling Squared

Sampling

Functions for creating a importance sampling object and running the Importance Sampling Squared methods.

is2()

Generic function for calculating importance samples

is2(<pmwgs>)

S3 method for calculating importance samples for pmwgs objects

extract_pmwgs()

Extract samples from a pmwgs object (from pmwg package)

Internals

Functions used during importance sampling to compute the log weights, get log probability for random effects and more. You should not need to used these functions for most use cases.

compute_lw()

Calculate importance samples

get_logp()

Calculate the log probability of the data given the xxx

Data Access

Functions for accessing and exporting and summarising importance samples in easy to work with formats.

summary(<isample>)

Get summary measures of the importance samples

Mix

Functions for creating a mix of importance sampling distributions

mix_gaussian()

Create a mixture of gaussians for importance sampling

get_proposals()

Gets proposal mvnormal samples based on mix of gaussians

Datasets

Data included in the package

sdt_samples

Small pmwg set of samples for SDT model of LDT

Contents

Developed by Gavin Cooper, Reilly Innes, Caroline Kuhne, Jon-Paul Cavallaro, David Gunawan, Guy Hawkins, Scott Brown.
